Class AbstractSpatialLayer

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.render.BaseRenderer
com.arbergashi.charts.render.AbstractSpatialLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpatialChunkConsumer, SpatialPeakProvider, ChartRenderer, SpatialChunkRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Candlestick3DRenderer, LineSpatialRenderer, VoxelCloudRenderer
public abstract class AbstractSpatialLayer extends BaseRenderer implements SpatialChunkRenderer, SpatialPeakProvider
Base class for spatial-aware layers using batch mapping and projection.

Platform-independent and headless-certified. No AWT/Swing dependencies.

Since:
1.7.0

      model - model to map
      context - plot context (reserved for future spatial scaling)
